elements.label: My Half-Heart
elements.description: My passions, my drive, my charm, my thrumming blood, my clever fingers. If I present this to the world, I may be able to bend things to my will. [Use this while Exploring, Talking or Performing, and you may find or discuss things of interest to you]

elements.label: My Half-Heart [exhausted]
elements.description: My passions, my drive, my charm, my thrumming blood, my clever fingers. Each need a rest.

elements.label: My Lack-Heart
elements.description: A wound in the soul, a raw nerve, a longing. If I leave this exposed, the universe will try to fill it. [Use this while Exploring, Talking or Performing and you may find Tunes, Stories or other Inspirations]

elements.label: My Lack-Heart [exhausted]
elements.description: A wound in the soul, a raw nerve, a longing. I could not bear to expose it now.
